channel.title: Html5 on Chao Yang
channel.description: Recent content in Html5 on Chao Yang

item.title: HTML 5
item.description: new elements &lt;figure&gt; and <figcaption&gt; <figure id="fig1"> <figcaption>Fig.1 Screen Reader Support for WAI-ARIA</figcaption> <img src="http://img2.cache.netease.com/cnews/2015/4/28/201504281107026599c.jpg" alt="JAWS: Landmarks 1/1, Forms 4/5 â€¦ "> </figure> &lt;mark&gt; This tag is very useful for the highlight of searching result. <h1>Yes, You Can Use <mark>HTML5</mark> Today!</h1> &lt;progress&gt; and <meter&gt; <progress max="100" value="0"><meter value="50" min="0" max="400" low="60" high="300" title="gigabytes"> <meter value="150" min="0" max="400" low="60" high="300" title="gigabytes"> <meter value="350" min="0" max="400" low="60" high="300" title="gigabytes"> the low and high are the thresholds.
